title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedding provider in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); markdown, code highlighting, multi-model chats.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like server backed by Ollama models; provides completions for VS Code.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust; chat, manage models, keyboard driven.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama REST API; generate, chat, pull models with Nim idioms.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET/C# wrapper for Ollama; strongly-typed models, dependency injection friendly.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model preload options.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; generate, chat, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using Ollama; mentions or DM, configurable model per channel.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama inside notes; templates and commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines; pull model, run tests.

title: ollama-rag-qdrant
summary: Official example repo showing RAG with Ollama embeddings and Qdrant vector search.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama; simple API wrapper for generate/chat operations.
